data.name: PrivacyPolicy
data.value: Privacy Policy

data.name: PrivacyIntro1
data.value: This website is a community project where people can share farewell messages or create a page for someone to be remembered. We respect your privacy and keep things simple and transparent.

data.name: WhatWeCollect
data.value: What We Collect

data.name: WhenLeavingMessage
data.value: When leaving a message:

data.name: NameOptional
data.value: Name (optional): Shown with your message if provided.

data.name: EmailOptional
data.value: Email (optional): Used privately for moderation/contact if needed. Never shown publicly.

data.name: FarewellMessagePublic
data.value: Farewell Message: Publicly visible once submitted.

data.name: WhenCreatingPage
data.value: When creating a page:

data.name: DisplayNameReq
data.value: Display Name: Required, shown publicly on the page.

data.name: DescriptionReq
data.value: Description: Required, shown publicly on the page.

data.name: ImageReq
data.value: Image (Background & Portrait): You must upload an image when creating a page. By uploading, you give us permission to display it publicly and store/share it with our image hosting provider.

data.name: HowYourDataUsed
data.value: How Your Data Is Used

data.name: PubliclyVisible
data.value: Names, messages, page titles, descriptions, and images are shown publicly.

data.name: EmailsPrivate
data.value: Emails (if provided) stay private and are only used by admins for moderation purposes.

data.name: ImagesThirdParty
data.value: Images are stored on and delivered by third-party hosting services/CDNs.

data.name: CookiesAnalytics
data.value: Cookies and Analytics

data.name: EssentialCookies
data.value: We use a small number of essential cookies that are required for the site's security and basic functionality. These do not track you and do not require consent.

data.name: CFAnalytics
data.value: We use Cloudflare Web Analytics to understand basic traffic (page views, referrers, device type). This analytics service is cookie-less and privacy-focused.

data.name: NoAdsTrackers
data.value: No advertising or tracking cookies are used.

data.name: CFAnalyticsLinkPrefix
data.value: You can read more about Cloudflare Web Analytics and privacy here:

data.name: CFLinkText
data.value: Cloudflare Web Analytics

data.name: YourChoices
data.value: Your Choices

data.name: PostAnonymously
data.value: You can post farewell messages anonymously (no name/email required).

data.name: RemovalRequest
data.value: You can request to have your message, page, or any associated info removed.

data.name: CreatingPageAgreement
data.value: Creating a page means you agree to publicly share the display name, description, and image you provide.

data.name: OtherThings
data.value: Other Things You Should Know

data.name: DontSell
data.value: We don't sell or trade your data.

data.name: NoAdsBeyondLogs
data.value: We don't run ads or trackers beyond basic server logs.

data.name: OpenSourceNote
data.value: This is an open-source project (GPL-3), built for the community.

data.name: AgreementPara
data.value: By using this site, you're agreeing to share your farewell messages or pages publicly, and (if creating a page) to let us display and host the image you upload. That's allâ€”no hidden stuff.
